title: [Medicine] Human Herpesvirus 6B Greatly Increases Risk of Depression by Activating Hypothalamic-Pituitary -Adrenal Axis during Latent Phase of Infection

[Health] Brain benefits of exercise can be gained with a single protein. A liver protein may be responsible for the well-known benefits of exercise on the aging brain, according to a new study in mice. The findings could lead to new therapies on people who are unable to exercise due to physical limitations.
